synopsis.text: Saya's enigmatic presence disrupts Riki Naoe's life in "Little Busters! EX," as he grapples with her cryptic motives and the mysterious organization, the Dark Executives, that seem intent on keeping them apart. As Riki delves deeper into Saya's world, he uncovers a hidden treasure and confronts truths about his own past. Meanwhile, Sasami Sasasegawa and Kanata Futaki, two other heroines, find themselves entangled in extraordinary circumstances with Riki. Sasami, a dog-lover cursed to transform into a cat, enlists Riki's help to break the spell, while Kanata, burdened by her past, seeks solace and support from Riki as they work together on the Little Busters baseball club. These captivating stories unfold across special episodes included with the 'Little Busters! Refrain' BD/DVD volumes, providing a thrilling and emotional rollercoaster ride for fans of the beloved series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
